price: 20. Usun rooruh yan qaraakiiyih amol cusuulah anuk itta wagitak, kaadu ken rihmisneh (alkumusneh) curral qeyni deqsita agabul.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
